column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Delicious but heavy ! Definitely bring your stomach!  While the food was great
column2: it takes awhile to get your food. I  came around 3pm and we ordered food at the pre order place
column3: but it took an hour before the food finally arrived. When we asked about the status of our order
column4: they told us " it'll arrive when it'll arrived " so that was unhelpful. Also the calamari was good but it's different - the breading is like fried chicken in feel.
